we_understand_you_cannot_come: We understand that you are unable to attend this time.
we_look_forward_next_time: We look forward to the opportunity to see you on a future occasion!
would_you_like_to_join: Would you like to join and celebrate with us on any of the following dates?
thank_you_for_accept: Thank you for accepting our invitation.
see_you_in_quang_ngai: We look forward to seeing you on November 8, 2024 in Quang Ngai!
see_you_in_da_dang: We look forward to seeing you on November 10, 2024 in Da Nang!
